com.github.jessemull.microflexinteger.util

Class ImmutableMathUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.jessemull.microflexinteger.util.ImmutableMathUtil

  • public class ImmutableMathUtil
extends Object
    Implementation of big integer and big decimal methods missing from the java math library but required for the MicroFlex math and statistics packages. The immutable math utility currently supports the following additional operations for the BigDecimal and BigInteger classes:
    Operation
    Square Root
    Fractional Exponentiation
    Natural Exponentiation
    Natural Log
    Author:
    Jesse L. Mull

      • pow

        public static BigDecimal pow(BigDecimal base,
                             BigDecimal power)
        Raises the base to the power and returns the result. Calculates the power by finding the natural log using a Taylor sequence and exp using Newton's method of approximating the nth root.
        Parameters:
        BigDecimal - base the base
        BigDecimal - power the power
        Returns:
        the result
